tips.title: Give clear and specific instructions
tips.example: e.g., "Please summarize the following text in 3 sentences or fewer."

tips.title: Specify the expected output format
tips.example: e.g., "The response should be in JSON format: {"number_of_cranes": , "number_of_turtles": }"

tips.title: Assign a role to the model
tips.example: e.g., "You are a tour guide. Please recommend a sightseeing spot."

tips.title: Encourage thought processes (Chain of Thought)
tips.example: e.g., "Solve the problem step by step."

tips.title: Provide specific examples (Few-shot learning)
tips.example: e.g., "Explain the meaning of the saying 'The early bird catches the worm.' Now, explain the meaning of 'Patience is a virtue.'"

tips.title: Clarify the audience
tips.example: e.g., "Explain it in a way that even elementary school students can understand."

tips.title: Instruct to use specific words or phrases
tips.example: e.g., "Please include the phrase 'The important point is...' in the response."

tips.title: Avoid bias and stereotypes
tips.example: e.g., "Please respond in an unbiased and neutral manner."

tips.title: Omit excessive politeness
tips.example: e.g., "Please be concise. There is no need to say 'please' or 'thank you.'"

tips.title: Use delimiters to clarify
tips.example: e.g., "The text is surrounded by '---': ---text here---"

tips.title: Break down complex tasks
tips.example: e.g., "First summarize the key points, then suggest a solution."

tips.title: Respond based on specific information
tips.example: e.g., "Please refer to the following text: 'Text content'"

tips.title: Specify the length of the response
Show the problem-solving process
tips.example: e.g., "Solve the following equation and explain the steps."
